response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This exceptional item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you at a special price that reflects its true worth and our mutual interest. For this unique transaction, I propose to sell the product to you for $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure a fair exchange while maximizing the value for both parties involved. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of completing this transaction soon. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 950000}
